name: Vegan Gluten free Coffee Cake - Sweet Potato Pecan Crumb Cake
description: Vegan Gluten free Coffee Cake - Simple Fall Sweet Potato Pecan Crumb Cake with Pumpkin pie spices. Warm Cozy slice of cake. Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe. Makes 8 by 8 inch brownie pan
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup white rice flour or brown rice flour
2 to 3 tsp pumpkin pie spice (, or add or 1 tsp cinnamon, ½ tsp ginger, ¼ to ⅓ tsp nutmeg, ⅛ tsp cloves)
3/4 cup Sweet potato puree ((I use canned))
3 tbsp oat flour or use other gluten-free flour
4 tbsp sugar ((I use 2 tbsp coconut and 2 tbsp cane sugar))
a few drops of vanilla extract
1/2 tsp cinnamon or chai spice or pumpkin pie spice
2.5 tbsp refined coconut oil or organic safflower oil

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl whisk all the dry ingredients really well. In another bowl mix the wet ingredients and mix to combine well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl whisk all the dry ingredients really well. In another bowl mix the wet ingredients and mix to combine well.

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in the dry into the wet until mixed. Let the mixture sit to hydrate for 5 minutes. Meanwhile line the pan with parchment or grease. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in the dry into the wet until mixed. Let the mixture sit to hydrate for 5 minutes. Meanwhile line the pan with parchment or grease. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the stiff batter into the prepared pan. Even it out using a spatula.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer the stiff batter into the prepared pan. Even it out using a spatula.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients under crumb until the mixture sticks to form fat crumbs. Add more oil if needed. Spread the crumb mixture on top of the batter evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the ingredients under crumb until the mixture sticks to form fat crumbs. Add more oil if needed. Spread the crumb mixture on top of the batter evenly.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 45 to 50 minutes or until toothpick from the center comes out almost clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 45 to 50 minutes or until toothpick from the center comes out almost clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from pan after 5 minutes then let cool for another 15 mins before slicing. Serve as is or topped with whipped coconut cream or vegan ice cream.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from pan after 5 minutes then let cool for another 15 mins before slicing. Serve as is or topped with whipped coconut cream or vegan ice cream.
